entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 2022 Blazor project builds and runs successfully but publish fails with System.ArgumentException #38186
  • Builder.WebHost.UseUrls does not seem to override default url #38185
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Build From Source inconsistencies #38181
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation 3.2.21 has broken dependencies on NuGet #38172
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext, plaintext #38170
  • Startup regression: mapaction #38169
  • Blazor WASM transfer file #38166

Closed

  • [Test failure] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.FunctionalTests.HtmlGenerationTest.HtmlGenerationWebSite_GeneratesExpectedResults_WithImageData #34599
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Add the KestrelServerOptionsSetup service in ConfigureKestrel() #30468
    7.0-preview1
  • Mvc.Analyzer test code exceeds MAX_PATH #9431
    6.0-docs-infra
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] make Github desktop ignore irrelevent files #38167
  • Windows 7: Blazor-Server CSS hot reload doesn't work #38188
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • ControllerEndpointRoute API Comment Misunderstood #36279
    Discussions
  • Quarantined RedisEndToEndTests #33851
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Startup improvement: mapaction #38052
  • Blazor webassembly debugging when hosting in gRPC Application #38131
  • .NET 6 Blazor typeparam constraints causing compilation error #38041
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor compilation errors showing only in generated .razor.g.cs files and not in my code #38069
  • BrowserRefreshServer.WaitForClientConnectionAsync #37974
  • [Blazor webasm] Please provide global way to set JSON serialization settings #38144
  • [Blazor Server .NET 6] Dispose sometimes called after a while (or never) when tab or browser closed #38147
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] make it easier to build projects to electron #38159
  • [asp.net 7] [feature request] [experimental] bring figma sharp to light #38161
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] bring integrations of popular webapp build process #38163
  • Regression: "The path must be absolute." on Linux #38175
  • [asp.net core 7] [Feature Request] Further Compressing Blazor's render html on release build. #38164
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] Multi-thread support for blazor #38160
  • [asp.net 7] [feature request] Let's archive more issues and keep ones that's truely active, lower the number of opened issues, for the sake of collaboration #38162
  • Docker compose Linux container error "The path must be absolute." #37876
  • template does not support file scoped namespace declaration #38165
  • CS0103 The name '__builder' does not exist in the current context BlazorAppDebugBug Index.razor.g.cs #21883
  • Dependency conflict when hosting multiple Blazor Webassembly applications. #23133
    Backlog
  • Unable to hit breakpoints for Blazor in VS or the browser #24176
    Backlog
  • Blazor server. Scoped Service created twice outside the @Body. * is bug? * #31278
    Backlog
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path 'service-worker.js'. #37516
  • Blazor Client side not publishing correctly #37535
  • [Blazor rc1 & rc2] 'System.InvalidOperationException' in Microsoft.JSInterop.dll or 'Microsoft.JSInterop.JSDisconnectedException' in Microsoft.JSInterop.dll #37609
  • Selecting ,Dragging and dropping text in the SummorNote throws 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore')' Exception #37638
  • Session Value lost only in Chrome after AJAX post #37687
  • This is a matter of how your web server is configured, not about Blazor WebAssembly. #37689
  • Issue with runing dotnet webApp after Edited the Index page #37743
  • Removing lib folder with bootstrap and others, and html Links from template project, continues causing build errors #37711
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.BadHttpRequestException #37740
  • SPA proxy not loading pls help #37850
  • Slow to load pages post controller completing #37860

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK and baseline #38184
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Consolidate test projects for helix #38183
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Visual Studio 2019 components configuration file #38182
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Unskip HtmlGeneration tests #38138
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • fix - Add the `KestrelServerOptionsSetup` service in `ConfigureKestrel()` #38177
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #38143
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21555.1 #38179
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `16f637f` to `bf0701d` #38174
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Flow ReadAtLeast calls to underlying PipeReader #32568
    area-runtime
  • Adding descriptions in HttpSysOptions #37949
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
    area-infrastructure
